attributes.action: build a new Mountjoy School for children with Special Educational Needs in Bridport, West Dorset.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current dilapidated building is unfit for purpose and provides accommodation at a lower standard of that in a developing country.

The children and staff alike deserve better, particularly as it is a successful school the local community is proud of.

Please do not discriminate against these children by failing to provide adequate facilities.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
